title: You have indeed been a worthy ambassador of our country, President Buhari tells Barkindo, outgoing OPEC Secretary General
description: Abuja, Nigeria, 5 July 2022--President Muhammadu Buhari Tuesday in Abuja expressed the nationâ€™s gratitude to the outgoing Secretary General of the Organization of the Petroleum Exporting Countries (OPEC), Mohammed Barkindo, describing him as a worthy ambassador of the country.
